title: Simple Steps to Orient Google Maps North

steps.title: Open the Google Maps app.
steps.content: Open the Google Maps app. It's an app showing a map with a "G" in it.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰. It's in the upper-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . It's located toward the bottom of the page.

steps.title: Tap Navigation Settings.
steps.content: Tap Navigation Settings . It's about halfway down the page.

steps.title: Slide the Keep Map North Up button to the On position.
steps.content: Slide the Keep Map North Up button to the On position. It will turn blue. Now, when you open the Google Maps app, the map will be in the north-facing position.
